thread.title: Ferrari Challenge Europe: Another podium for Gautam Singhania
thread.title_full: Ferrari Challenge Europe: Another podium for Gautam Singhania - Sports

author: A Correspondent
title: Ferrari Challenge Europe: Another podium for Gautam Singhania
text:
Gautam Singhania, Chairman and Managing Director of Raymond Limited, racked up his ninth podium finish of the season after finishing second in Race 2 at Valencia in the Coppa Shell category of the Ferrari Challenge Europe Championship 2015.
Having finished second in Saturday's Race 1, the Kessel Racing driver moved into second place in the drivers' standings right behind teammate Jacques Duyver. The next race will be on November 6.


Gautam Singhania
